message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.
I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $11,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that $11,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13,000. It's a great price, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of this product.
